episode: My daughter is visiting San Francisco, and I am hopeful that she will be safe, and return satisfied with her latest journey.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My daughter is visiting San Francisco and I am hopeful that she will be safe and return satisfied with her latest journey.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she'll have a great time and stay safe!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well I always wonder, I love her so and quite often she will just take some time and go visit a far off place.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's natural to worry, but it's great she's exploring.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, she's 30 years old and I have always mentioned to her, that if she does wish to travel, the most opportune time is when she is young.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, that's wise advice.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: There are so many responsibilities as one gets older during their journey through life.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: True, it's important to seize the moment.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And she's definitely doing that, I am happy for her, but it's such an unsettled word, I do my worrying, at the same time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand, it's normal to worry.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: So really all I can do is pray for her while she is away and be hopeful that all will be fine.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a good approach.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And I often tell myself she's doing what pleases her, so I should also be content, knowing that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Exactly.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I do look forward to her calls and texts though, hopefully, she'll take the time now and then.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure she will!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I imagine I would be a wreck if I didn't hear from her.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But time will tell, so I'll be patient, she only left yesterday.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's understandable.
